naslov: Kuća s bazenom Putičanje, Pirovac, Dalmacija, odlična investicija, 140 (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se kuća u Putičanjima, malenome mjestu sjeverno od Pirovca, na manje od 10 minuta vožnje do mora. Na terenu od 982 m2 nalaze se kuća od ukupno 140 m2, dvorište od 797 m2 i grijani bazen od 25 m2. Kuća je samostojeća, prizemnica, a sastoji se od 2 stana spojena velikom, svjetlom verandom. Prvi dio kuće je stan s dnevnim boravkom i kuhinjom, 2 spavaće sobe i kupaonom. Drugi dio kuće je stan koji se sastoji od dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, degažmana, kupaone, toaleta i 2 spavaće sobe. Oba stana su omeđena terasama. Stanovi su klimatizirani. Kupaone su na slici u fazi renovacije, no renovacija je završena - nove pločice, tuš kabine i kondenzacijski bojleri Ariston. U velikoj okućnici nalazi se mnoštvo sadržaja koji čine kuću idealnom za turističko iznajmljivanje, ali i ugodan život: grijani bazen, brojna sunčališta, vrtne kućice, kamin, nadstrešnice, ljuljačke, tobogan i malo sportsko igralište. U okućnici ima mjesta za 4 automobila. Kuća se prodaje nenamještena, no moguć je dogovor oko cijene namještaja. Čisto vlasništvo. _____________________ EN This house for sale is located in Putičanje, a small town north of Pirovac, less than a 10-minute drive to the sea. On a plot of 982 m2, there is a house of a total of 140 m2, a yard of 797 m2 and a heated pool of 25 m2. The house is detached, one-story (ground floor), and consists of 2 apartments connected by a large, bright veranda. The first part of the house is an apartment with a living room and kitchen, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom. The second part of the house is an apartment consisting of a living room with a kitchen and dining room, a storage room, a bathroom, a toilet and 2 bedrooms. Both apartments have their own terraces. The apartments are air-conditioned. The bathrooms were under renovation in the time of photoshooting, but are done now - new tiles, shower cabins and Ariston condensing boiler heaters. In the large garden, there is a lot of content that makes the house ideal for tourist rental, but also a pleasant life: heated swimming pool, numerous sunbathing areas, garden houses, grill, canopies, swings, slide and a small sports field. There is room for 4 cars in the garden. The stated price is for the unfurnished house, but it is possible to sell the furniture as well. Proper ownership.
